title: Your last played Champion is now wearing the Pyrovision Goggles.

replies.body: He's already wearing them. That's why he's so much fun

{{champion:1}} ...

Yeah, I don't think there's much of a difference besides the fact that she's now throwing Rainbows (in her head, anyway. Everyone else is still burning under Tibbers)

{{champion:75}} 

Sees an endless horde of low-health cannon minions.

OP made the question without considering that every other champion is one seriously screwed up sonuvabich.
Pyro ain't got nothing on {{champion:1}}
{{champion:117}}  She would see what she already sees on a daily basis.

{{champion:107}} 

Now I get to hunt unicorns!

> [{quoted}](name=ZeUberOmegaZoid,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=dE7ZQeEN,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-07-25T03:36:39.943+0000)
>
> {{champion:107}} 
> 
> Now I get to hunt unicorns!

And babies with champion heads?

> [{quoted}](name=ZeUberOmegaZoid,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=dE7ZQeEN,comment-id=000400000000,timestamp=2015-07-25T15:17:41.550+0000)
>
> Champions with baby heads?

In the Meet the Pyro trailer, Pyro, in his vision, can see the other mercenaries but they all have baby bodies. He thinks he's giving a baby heavy a lollipop when outside, he's actually chopping Heavy's head with a Fire Axe.
{{champion:63}} "Ready to set the world on fire? Heheheh..."

{{champion:134}}

Barely any difference here. Especially with Atlantean and Justicar skins.
